title: Ekko, the Boy Who Shattered Time, available now

replies.body:
"Its not how much dick you have, it's how you use it." -Ekko
"The unseen dick is the deadliest." -Zed
"I don't have a dick, and soon, neither will you!" -Fiddlesticks
"Your dick, my hands." -Lee Sin
"The dick always rises." -Leona
"Will I make your dick rise... or stop!" -Ahri
"Dick." -Rammus
"Wuju... pass me that dick?" -Master Yi
"Imagine if I had a real dick?" -Jax
"So many dicks, so little time." -Caitlynn
"GET DICKED!" -Vi
"Stuck between a rock, and a hard dick." -Malphite
Upvote if you insta-bought like me -- Ekko here I come! {{summoner:6}}
~~Insta-bought~~ bought 4 seconds before it was available.
Upvote if you wish you could insta-buy....but don't have enough RP :(
I downvoted because you asked for an upvote... You can't ask to be popular, you have to be chill and let it happen. Then, and ONLY then.... can you eat at the cool kid's table.
The sad part is someone else was asking for upvotes involving instantly buying Ekko, and somehow he got them. People are strange.
*becomes famous for saying this*
How to get upvoted: be an asshole but don't make it obvious, or appeal to the crowd in an asshole-ish way. I see it alot.
{{champion:421}} Time for some dare i say it Ekkolocation!
Let the inevitable "this champion is so op and broken" comments commence.
THIS CHAMPION IS SO OP AND BROKEN ITS NOT EVEN FAIR!!!!!!!!11!!!one!!1!

It takes dedication to yell and rage with a "one" spelled inside your exclamation points lol

I admire your spirit.

Yea, in a way he kind of is...

just went 19/3/7 as a Jungler lol

Leggo mah Ekko :D
is this going to be a 7800ip trick? (were the champ become 7800ip at first but then gets lowered to 6300ip?)
Every champion is 7800ip the week of release...
4 seconds after hes lowered to 6300 hes going to be brought back up to 7800
So is this one gonna be OP or UP until next patch?
OP

After whatever the Hell {{champion:432}} was suppose to be, glad to see a viable champion come out. Is there an Ekko in here or is it just me?
Bard was pretty cool imo, not as cool as Rek'Sai, but atleast it didn't get nerfed into crap like she was. It's just really hard to play, and It's also pretty fun.
lol for thinking bard isn't "viable" bronze much
He can be argued as "viable" but a lot of his kit is risky and easy to miss or read. At least that's how I see it.
I'm on the toilet at school just to read patch notea.

Respect...
this is how i read the patch notes i sit on toilet like {{summoner:13}} then i read{{summoner:2}}

Have fun while you can, he has more burst than Zed+LB. They'll probably nerf hard next patch.
{{summoner:6}} {{summoner:6}}

oh man lets get a hexakill with ekko

"Hey everyone, we're releasing a new champion!"  
*Releases while possibly biggest counter is on free week*

I wish they did the Sandstorm skin a little differently, Ekko is just begging for a good Prince of Persia skin with the whole time control theme.


That and a Doctor Who theme skin!
.... that is a prince of persia skin...? don't know how they could have made that more obvious without calling it prince of persia ekko
You guys forget that, unfortunately, they wasted that sort of theme on Malzahar. They can't give Ekko a dagger and all the same dealybops because Malz already has a skin like that. :v
Dude yes.
I wonder what Effect all this Time Travel will have on the Summoner's Rift Ekkosystem
